scripts.prep: copyfiles analytics.js dist && cat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && chokidar 'node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.css' 'styles.css' -c 'npm run build-css'
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-html"
